Title: Bad Education
Actors: Gael García Bernal, Fele Martínez, Daniel Giménez Cacho, Lluís Homar
Plot: An examination on the effect of Franco-era religious schooling and sexual abuse on the lives of two longtime friends.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 16 wins & 41 nominations.
Production: Canal+ España, El Deseo S.A., Televisión Española (TVE)
